The Stream Link tool assigns unique values to sections of a raster linear network between intersections.

The raster that defines a linear stream network.

The raster that defines the direction of flow out of each cell.

The D8 method must be used to determine flow direction.

The name of the stream link raster layer that will be created and added to the map.

The type of output that will be created. The output can be a tiled imagery layer or a dynamic imagery layer.

The name of the folder in My content where the result will be saved.
